prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Synth Lead, Brass, Drums, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a combination of Guitar, Synth Lead, Brass, Drums, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Synth Lead, Brass, Drums, and Bass, with no Piano.

Style 3:
Guitar, Synth Lead, Brass, Drums, and Bass are all present in this song, but Piano is not included.
